images.description: The Philosophical Transactions plate XXVII figure 13 (1861) sketch of spiral galaxy NGC 3184, with labels showing the portions corresponding to star-forming regions NGC 3180 and NGC 3181
SDSS image of region near spiral galaxy NGC 3184
SDSS image of spiral galaxy NGC 3184, also showing ionized hydrogen regions NGC 3180 and NGC 3181
NOAO image of spiral galaxy NGC 3184
Spitzer SINGS infrared image of spiral galaxy NGC 3184
